page.title: 05INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {Mr Merry} Mr. David Merry,Chairman of Middleton Cheney Parish Council. Mr. Merry has lived in the village for thirty years and was elected onto the Parish Council by the local people. There has been a Parish Council in the village for over fifty years, funded by the local Rates. The Council has thirteen Members whose concern is the environmental welfare of the Community. Over the next twelve months an estimated #17,500 will be spent. It is hoped that everyone in the community will benefit from the Parish Council's work. {Mr. Cliff Christie.} Mr. Christie has earnt himself the title of local "Bird Man". He looks after sick birds from all over the country, as many as six hundred a year. His wife uses hypnosis to anaesthetize birds.
